00020 struct CoulWaves {
00022   double F; 
00024   double dF;
00026   double G;
00028   double dG;
00029 };
00030 
00032 
00039 class CoulFunc {
00040  public:
00044   CoulFunc(PPair *pPair) {
00045     z1_=pPair->GetZ(1);
00046     z2_=pPair->GetZ(2);
00047     redmass_=(double)pPair->GetRedMass();
00048     lLast_=0;
00049     radiusLast_=0.0;
00050     energyLast_=0.0;
00051     coulLast_.F=0.0;
00052     coulLast_.dF=0.0;
00053     coulLast_.G=0.0;
00054     coulLast_.dG=0.0;
00055     };
00059   int z1() const {
00060     return z1_;
00061   };
00065   int z2() const {
00066     return z2_;
00067   };
00071   double redmass() const {
00072     return redmass_;
00073   };
00078   int lLast() const {
00079     return lLast_;
00080   };
00085   double radiusLast() const {
00086     return radiusLast_;
00087   };
00092   double energyLast() const {
00093     return energyLast_;
00094   };
00098   struct CoulWaves coulLast() const {
00099     return coulLast_;
00100   };
00104   void setLast(int lLast, double rLast, double eLast, CoulWaves coulLast) {
00105     lLast_=lLast;
00106     radiusLast_=rLast;
00107     energyLast_=eLast;
00108     coulLast_.F=coulLast.F;
00109     coulLast_.dF=coulLast.dF;
00110     coulLast_.G=coulLast.G;
00111     coulLast_.dG=coulLast.dG;
00112   };
00118   CoulWaves operator()(int l,double radius,double energy) {
00119     struct CoulWaves result={0.0,0.0,0.0,0.0};
00120     if(l==lLast()&&radius==radiusLast()&&energy==energyLast()) {
00121       result=coulLast();
00122     } else {
00123       std::complex<double> eta(sqrt(uconv/2.)*fstruc*z1()*z2()*
00124                                sqrt(redmass()/energy),0.);
00125       std::complex<double> rho(sqrt(2.*uconv)/hbarc*radius*
00126                                sqrt(redmass()*energy),0.);
00127       std::complex<double> lValue( (double) l, 0.);
00128       Coulomb_wave_functions coul(true,lValue,eta);
00129       std::complex<double> c_F, c_dF, c_G, c_dG;
00130       coul.F_dF(rho,c_F,c_dF);
00131       coul.G_dG(rho,c_G,c_dG);
00132       struct CoulWaves newResult={real(c_F),real(c_dF),real(c_G),real(c_dG)};
00133       setLast(l,radius,energy,newResult);
00134       result=newResult;
00135     }
00136     return result;
00137   };
00142   double Penetrability(int l,double radius,double energy)  {
00143     struct CoulWaves coul=this->operator()(l,radius,energy);
00144     double rho=sqrt(2.*uconv)/hbarc*radius*sqrt(redmass()*energy);
00145     return rho/(pow(coul.F,2.0)+pow(coul.G,2.0));
00146   };
00151   double PEShift(int l,double radius,double energy)  {
00152     struct CoulWaves coul=this->operator()(l,radius,energy);
00153     double rho=sqrt(2.*uconv)/hbarc*radius*sqrt(redmass()*energy);
00154     return rho/(pow(coul.F,2.0)+pow(coul.G,2.0))*
00155       (coul.F*coul.dF+coul.G*coul.dG);
00156   };
00161   double PEShift_dE(int l,double radius,double energy)  {
00162     return gsl_PEshift_function_dE(this,l,radius,energy);
00163   };
00164  private:
00165   int z1_;
00166   int z2_;
00167   int lLast_;
00168   double redmass_;
00169   double radiusLast_;
00170   double energyLast_;
00171   struct CoulWaves coulLast_;
00172 };
